body.name: Pirate Battery 4B-BS Maintenance Free Replacement Battery for Suzuki and Yamaha Motorcycle: 12 Volts, 3 Amps, 2.3 Ah, Tab Terminal
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 56 mins
features: BATTERY TYPE: YT4B-BS Absorbent Glass Mat battery is rechargeable AGM battery fits in a variety of applications.

TOP TECHNOLOGY: The Acid inside is constructed with Absorbed Glass Mat technology allowing for a low-maintenance and spill proof battery. Patented sealed post prevents corrosion, which gives extended battery life.
EASY APPLICATION: Pirate Batteries come fully charged and ready to go once delivered. Simply connect your battery to the application and you are ready to go.
PRECISE VOLTAGE REGULATION: Pirate batteries maintain precise voltage levels, ensuring consistent and stable power delivery for your devices.
UNBEATABLE WARRANTY: Top notch customer service from real battery experts! Guaranteed 12 Months warranty with 45-day refund policy. Fast 2-3 day shipping.
body.description: Pirate unveils the YT4B-BS sealed AGM batteries, tailored for adventurers who are also seeking cost-effective results. Each battery is equipped with lead calcium alloy and absorbed glass mat AGM technology, which allows a complete maintenance-free and high-performance operation. You can embrace a better warranty and an enhanced returns policy compared to our other brand; Zipp, ensuring durable performance at a reasonable price. Fiberglass mat separators and high cell compression extend battery life by providing superior vibration resistance from the most extreme conditions. All YT4B-BS Pirate Battery brand AGM batteries are rigorously tested to ensure safety, OEM compatibility, effectiveness, and optimal performance.YT4B-BS is a 12V 4CCA High Performance Sealed AGM BatteryYT4B-BS has AGM Separators for superior design and durability.YT4B-BS Battery Features:Patented sealed post prevents corrosion which gives extended battery life. No spills, no leaks, and no water to check. Extreme vibration resistance to ensure maximum conductivity. High Cranking Amps & Low Self-Discharge Rate. Ready for immediate use. YT4B-BS Battery Specifications:Model: YT4B-BSDimensions : (H) 3.35" x (L) 4.45" (W) "Weight: 2.1 lbs.Volts: 12VPolarity: [- +]Condition: NewAlso Replaces: CYT4B-BS, 4415, YT4B-BS, 62T4B, UT4B-BS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: We bought two for our Yamaha 50s. They work great. We have had no problems since installed about a month ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For now the battery is working fine, only need pass time for durability

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Started right up
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Installed straight out the box and started right up I have had it installed for 4 months now and never died works great will order again if needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great in a Yamaha TTR-50
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this battery in our Yamaha TTR-50. Cheaper than the last battery and can crank the bike longer on those hard-to-start cold days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I tried to get replacement. Mine was busted and didn’t work. App didn’t allow me to go through with return process, just kept going back to questions. Wasted my money on broken battery!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect fitment for my kids TTR50. Instructions were explained easily and the battery has been perfect for weeks!
